rules.name: absorptionStaysWithoutHeartsFix
rules.description: Fixes absorption effect not going away even after the absorption hearts are gone

rules.name: armorStandMissingFunctionalityFix
rules.description: Fixes ArmorStands losing functionality due to 'optimizations'
extras: The marker tag will still prevent interaction though

rules.name: armorStandNegateAnvilDamageFix
rules.description: Fixes armor stands not being damaged by anvils

rules.name: armorStandNegateCactusDamageFix
rules.description: Fixes armor stands not being damaged by cactus

rules.name: armorStandNegateLavaDamageFix
rules.description: Fixes armor stands not taking damage in lava

rules.name: armorStandsCantRideVehiclesFix
rules.description: Fixes armor stands not being able to ride vehicles

rules.name: arrowEffectsBypassTotemsFix
rules.description: Fixes arrows of harming bypassing Totems of Undying

rules.name: badVillagerPyrotechnicsFix
rules.description: Fixes villagers being hurt by there own fireworks

rules.name: beaconsAlwaysPlaySoundOnBreakFix
rules.description: Fixes beacons always playing the depowering sound when broken even if it was not powered

rules.name: bedLandingWrongCollisionFix
rules.description: Fixes being able to land on a trapdoor on top of a bed and get less fall damage even though you haven't touched the bed

rules.name: bedTeleportExploitFix
rules.description: Fixes a 8x teleport exploit using beds

rules.name: beeDupeFix
rules.description: Fixes bees duplicating while trying to load a beehive/beenest in unloaded chunks

rules.name: beeNotLeavingHiveFix
rules.description: Fixes bees not leaving the hive in the end & nether due to weather conditions

rules.name: beeStuckInVoidFix
rules.description: Fixes bees getting stuck in the void due to gravity being disabled

rules.name: beesDropLikeBouldersFix
rules.description: Fixes bees just not flying when spawning due to navigation not being set

rules.name: beesFearRainFix
rules.description: Fixes bees being able to feel none-existing rain

rules.name: beesSwimInWaterAndDieFix
rules.description: Fixes bees trying to swim in water causing them to die
extras: Bees must be reloaded for the fix to take place

rules.name: blackstoneButtonBreakSpeedFix
rules.description: Fixes Blackstone Buttons taking longer then other buttons to break

rules.name: blockCollisionCheckFix
rules.description: Fixes incorrect block collision checks for players
extras: This bug allows you to teleport to the end at your overworld position, amongst many other problems

rules.name: blockUpdateOrderFix
rules.description: Fixes issues where block updates are directional. Changes block update order from XYZ to XZY
extras: Warning! This changes how block updates are done and could effect some contraptions

rules.name: blueWitherSkullNotSavedFix
rules.description: Fixes Wither skull projectiles not saving if its charged/blue in there nbt

rules.name: boatMissingOcclusionFix
rules.description: Fixes boats sending the SPLASH event when ridden over a vibration occluding block

rules.name: boatsCreatedTooHighFix
rules.description: Fixes boats created from dispensers spawning more then half a block higher then the water

rules.name: boatsDontTakeFallDamageFix
rules.description: Fixes boats not being destroyed by fall damage

rules.name: boatsStuckInDispensersFix
rules.description: Fixes boats getting created within the dispenser that created them

rules.name: boatsTakeFallDamageFix
rules.description: Fixes boats breaking and giving fall damage under certain circumstances

rules.name: breakAnythingDoorGoalFix
rules.description: Fixes Zombies & Vindicators being able to break any block where a door was

rules.name: breakSwapGeneralItemDupeFix
rules.description: Fixes a general item dupe using shulker boxes

rules.name: brewingResetsOnUnloadFix
rules.description: Fixes brewing stands resetting there brewTime when being unloaded

rules.name: brokenHiddenStatusEffectFix
rules.description: Fixes broken status effect logic resulting in hidden status effects not running onRemove() or onApplied() for the correct effect strength

rules.name: bucketableMobsNotDetachingLeashesFix
rules.description: Fixes leashes not being detached on mobs being put in a bucket. So you don't get your leash back

rules.name: buriedTreasureAlwaysCenterFix
rules.description: Fixes buried treasure always generating in the center of a chunk

rules.name: cantJumpOffBlockWhenSneakingFix
rules.description: Fixes players unable to jump off the edge of blocks while sneaking and having a block above them

rules.name: catsBreakLeadsDuringGiftFix
rules.description: Fixes cats sometimes breaking there leads after giving a gift

rules.name: chestUsablePastWorldBorderFix
rules.description: Fixes chests being accessible outside the world border by placing a chest near it
extras: We do this by preventing chests from merging with other chests outside of the world border

rules.name: chorusFruitFallDamageFix
rules.description: Fixes chorus fruits item not resetting fall damage on teleport

rules.name: chunkSaveCooldownDelay
rules.description: Allows you to change the chunk save cooldown added in 22w05a
extras: Set to 10s by default, this is the delay between chunks aggressively saving
If your server has large lag spikes due to chunk saving, you can raise this number.
For obvious reasons, this rule is disabled when `reIntroduceVeryAggressiveSaving` is enabled

rules.name: comparatorSkipsBlockedChestFix
rules.description: Fixes comparators being unable to get the signal strength from a blocked chest

rules.name: comparatorTransparencyFix
rules.description: Fixes comparators not being able to get containers through opaque full blocks like pistons & observers

rules.name: comparatorUpdateFix
rules.description: Fixes the issue where comparators don't always get updated correctly

rules.name: conversionFix
rules.description: Fixes multiple different mob conversions, not transferring all the correct nbt

rules.name: convertConvertingZombieVillagersFix
rules.description: Fixes being able to start the conversion of zombie villagers while they are already converting

rules.name: creativeEnchantingCostsExperienceFix
rules.description: Fixes enchanting in creative mode still deducting experience

rules.name: creeperPortalFuseResetsFix
rules.description: Fixes creepers resetting there fuse duration when travelling through a nether portal after being ignited by flint & steel

rules.name: crossDimensionTeleportLosesStatsFix
rules.description: Fixes client stats being lost when teleporting between dimensions

rules.name: crystalExplodeOnExplodedFix
rules.description: Fixes End Crystals not exploding when damaged from explosions. End Crystal chaining

rules.name: daylightSensorPlacementFix
rules.description: Fixes daylight sensors not setting there power state when placed by a player

rules.name: deathTimeCorruptsMobsFix
rules.description: Fixes mobs with a deathTime higher then 19 causing entities to never die

rules.name: delayBetweenAutoSaves
rules.description: Allows you to change the delay between autosaves in ticks
extras: Shortening this number will make your server save more often which will also spread the load on the server

rules.name: depthStriderSlowsRiptideFix
rules.description: Fixes depth strider slowing down riptide, causing riptide to be slower in water and messing up the launching
validators: Its a client command so can be issued and potentially be effective when connecting to non-carpet/vanilla servers. In these situations (on vanilla servers) it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

rules.name: detectorRailDetectsTooEarlyFix
rules.description: Fixes detector rails detecting the minecarts to early and causing minecarts to go in the wrong direction

rules.name: detectorRailOffsetUpdateFix
rules.description: Fixes comparator signal ending prematurely due to offset block updates

rules.name: detectorRailsDontPowerDiagonallyFix
rules.description: Fixes detector rails not powering powered rails diagonally

rules.name: directionalBlockSlowdownFix
rules.description: Fixes movement slowdown being calculated based on last block in search. Uses the slowest value instead

rules.name: directionalMinecartCollisionFix
rules.description: Fixes minecart colliding when standing still

rules.name: doorBreakNotStoppedOnDeathFix
rules.description: Fixes BreakDoorGoal not stopping on entity death, leading to cracks that stay for a while

rules.name: doubleBlocksSkipEntityCheckFix
rules.description: Fixes double blocks like beds & doors from skipping the entity check

rules.name: doubleRetraction
rules.description: Re-adds 1.8 double retraction to pistons
extras: Gives pistons the ability to double retract without side effects

rules.name: dripstoneSkipsEntityCheckFix
rules.description: Fixes pointed dripstone skipping the entity check

rules.name: drownedEnchantedTridentsFix
rules.description: Fixes enchantments not working on tridents if thrown by a drowned

rules.name: duplicateBlockUpdatesFix
rules.description: Fixes some redstone components sending duplicated block updates

rules.name: duplicateEntityUUIDFix
rules.description: Fixes entities created with duplicate uuid's

rules.name: eatCakeFromAllSidesFix
rules.description: Fixes cakes being eaten from all sides

rules.name: endCrystalPlacingTooEarlyFix
rules.description: Fixes placing end crystals too early not re-summoning the Ender Dragon

rules.name: endPortalRemovesEffectsFix
rules.description: Fixes the end portal removing your status effects when going from the overworld to the end

rules.name: endVoidRingsFix
rules.description: Fixes the void rings in the end, which is a floating point error

rules.name: enderDragonDoesntDropBlocksFix
rules.description: Fixes the enderdragon not dropping the blocks it breaks

rules.name: endermanAvoidProjectilesInVehicleFix
rules.description: Fixes enderman doing teleporting effects and sounds and avoiding projectiles while in a vehicle

rules.name: endermanDontUpdateOnPlaceFix
rules.description: Fixes enderman not updating the block they place correctly
extras: Only applies if you use datapacks or mods. E.x. Enderman placing a wither skull will not spawn a wither

rules.name: endermanLowerPiercingFix
rules.description: Fixes piercing projectiles lowering there piercing when 'hitting' an enderman

rules.name: endermanPainfulTeleportFix
rules.description: Fixes enderman teleporting away during damage, making other damage systems believe the enderman got hurt. Such as wither skulls applying wither

rules.name: endermanTeleportWithoutAIFix
rules.description: Fixes enderman teleporting when they have the NoAI tag

rules.name: endermanUselessMinecartTeleportingFix
rules.description: Fixes enderman constantly trying to teleport when in a minecart under daylight

rules.name: entityBlockCollisionUsingCenterFix
rules.description: Fixes multiple bugs related to effects happening only when the entity center is in the block instead of hitbox

rules.name: entityGrowingUpCollisionClippingFix
rules.description: Fixes Entities growing up still clipping through walls if they have a collision above them

rules.name: entityRandomCrackingFix
rules.description: Fixes players being able to crack there player seed
extras: This makes it so random is shared between all entities. Which is a good performance boost
recommended that you set this on permanently, and restart the server for best results

rules.name: explosionBreaksItemFrameInWaterFix
rules.description: Fixes Explosions being able to destroy item frames in water

rules.name: explosionsBypassWorldBorderFix
rules.description: Fixes explosions being able to destroy blocks outside of the world border

rules.name: extendedBlockUpdateOrderFix
rules.description: Changes block updates that go 2 blocks out, so they have the same block update order
extras: Changes extended block update order from YZX to XZY
Warning! This changes how some block updates are done and could effect some contraptions

rules.name: fallingBlockDamageIsOffsetFix
rules.description: Fixes falling block damage bounding box being offset

rules.name: fallingBlockDuplicationFix
rules.description: Fixes falling blocks duping using the end portal

rules.name: fallingBlocksCantUseNetherPortalsFix
rules.description: Fixes Falling Blocks not being able to go through nether portals

rules.name: fishingOutsideWaterFix
rules.description: Fixes being able to fish outside of water

rules.name: followParentGoalBreaksMovementFix
rules.description: Fixes the follow parent goal not setting the movement control, causing babies to move incorrectly

rules.name: foxesDisregardPowderSnowFix
rules.description: Fixes Foxes not Respecting Powder Snow as a Snow Like block, Therefore Powder Snow would not have the same effect as Snow does

rules.name: foxesDropItemsWithLootOffFix
rules.description: Fixes gamerule doMobLoot not effecting foxes from dropping their items

rules.name: foxesGoToOriginDuringThunderFix
rules.description: Fixes foxes pathfinding to origin (0,0) during a thunderstorm

rules.name: frictionlessEntitiesFix
rules.description: Fixes frictionless goats, currently requires to be modified per mob

rules.name: geodeLavalogFix
rules.description: Fixes an edge case within geodes where it will waterlog a block next to lava, due to missing fluid check

rules.name: giantTreesHaveExtraLogFix
rules.description: Fixes giant trees creating an extra single log at the top corner

rules.name: giveCommandDupeFix
rules.description: Fixes being able to dupe items using the /give command

rules.name: grassSnowLayersFix
rules.description: Fixes grass turning to dirt if more then 1 snow layer is on top of it.

rules.name: grindstonesNotMovableFix
rules.description: Fixes grindstones not being movable

rules.name: hangingEntityTriggersTrapsFix
rules.description: Fixes item frames & paintings being able to interact with pressure plates & tripwire hooks, causing them to not de-power

rules.name: hardcodedSeaLevelFix
rules.description: Fixes incorrect sea level height being used when datapacks change the sea height

rules.name: headlessPistonFix
rules.description: Fixes being able to make and use Headless Pistons

rules.name: hopperMinecartSlowerAtOriginFix
rules.description: Fixes hopper minecarts being 4x slower at [0,0,0]

rules.name: hopperUpdateFix
rules.description: Fixes hoppers not giving block updates when placed while powered
extras: invisibleHopperFix is automatically enabled when used

rules.name: hoppersSelectMinecartsRandomlyFix
rules.description: Fixes hoppers choosing a random minecart, resulting in slower item transfers

rules.name: horseDupeFix
rules.description: Fixes a donkey/llama/horse dupe that is possible by using a client-side mod

rules.name: hungerGoesDownInPeacefulFix
rules.description: Fixes hunger depleting in peaceful mode

rules.name: iceWaterSkipsWaterloggedFix
rules.description: Fixes ice not turning to water when broken by a player if the block below is waterlogged

rules.name: illegalBreakingFix
rules.description: Fixes Breaking blocks that should not be able to be broken using headless pistons
extras: Illegal blocks are any blocks that have a hardness value of -1.0F

rules.name: inconsistentRedstoneTorchFix
rules.description: Fixes burnt-out redstone torches having inconsistent behavior for turning on again

rules.name: incorrectBounceLogicFix
rules.description: Fixes some entities not bouncing on slime blocks and getting stuck

rules.name: incorrectBubbleColumnLogicFix
rules.description: Fixes some entities getting stuck in bubble columns

rules.name: incorrectExplosionExposureFix
rules.description: Fixes incorrect explosion exposure calculations

rules.name: incorrectFallDamageFix
rules.description: Fixes incorrect fall distance calculations causing fall distance to build up over time with leads

rules.name: incorrectNbtChecks
rules.description: Fixes commands not allowing all nbt tags to work correctly

rules.name: incorrectPistonWorldBorderCheckFix
rules.description: Fixes pistons being able to push blocks outside of the world border

rules.name: inhabitedTimeFix
rules.description: Fixes InhabitedTime not always updating in some chunks

rules.name: instantFluidFlowingFix
rules.description: Fixes fluids being able to instantly flow!

rules.name: invisibleHopperFix
rules.description: Fixes hoppers being invisible when placed next to a powered block
extras: It fixes clients not being able to see the hopper, by redrawing them if powered

rules.name: invulnerableEndCrystalFix
rules.description: Fixes being able to make permanent invulnerable end crystals

rules.name: itemFramePlaysSoundOnReadFix
rules.description: Fixes item frames playing a sound when they are read from nbt

rules.name: jukeboxDiscItemOffsetOnBreakFix
rules.description: Fixes jukebox not spawning disc in the center of the block when broken

rules.name: lavaCalculatesWrongFireStateFix
rules.description: Fixes lava creating fire with incorrect block states

rules.name: lavaIgnoresBubbleColumnFix
rules.description: Fixes lava not being able to convert bubble columns to stone

rules.name: leashKnotNotUpdatingOnBreakFix
rules.description: Fixes leash not updating when mobs break there leashes

rules.name: lightningKillsDropsFix
rules.description: Fixes Lightning killing the items that drop from entities it kills

rules.name: markerArmorStandsCreateBubblesFix
rules.description: Fixes marker armor stands creating bubbles in water

rules.name: markerArmorStandsTriggerBlocksFix
rules.description: Fixes marker armor stands being able to trigger traps such as pressure plates, and string

rules.name: maxChunksSavedPerAutoSave
rules.description: Allows you to change the max amount of chunks that can save per autosave
extras: If your server has large lag spikes due to chunk saving, you can lower this number.

rules.name: maxChunksSavedPerTick
rules.description: Allows you to change the max amount of chunks that can save per tick for the 1.18 chunk saving system
extras: This is for the system which just attempt to save chunks every tick. Max chunks saved per tick

rules.name: maxTickLatency
rules.description: Allows you to change max tick delay before a task is cancelled
extras: Lower value raises the task leniency. Basically lower number means higher chance of success

rules.name: merchantTradePacketExceptionFix
rules.description: Fixes an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException error within the merchant trade packet

rules.name: minecartMissingOcclusionFix
rules.description: Fixes minecarts sending the ENTITY_PLACE event when placed on a vibration occluding block

rules.name: minecartWontBounceFix
rules.description: Fixes minecart not bouncing from any transparent block with a full face

rules.name: missingObserverUpdatesFix
rules.description: Fixes some events / actions not triggering observers

rules.name: mobsAttackThroughBlocksFix
rules.description: Fixes mobs being able to hit entities through blocks
extras: This might have an impact on performance, although shouldn't be that bad

rules.name: mobsConvertingWithoutBlocksFix
rules.description: Fixes mobs continuing to convert even if the block is no longer there

rules.name: mobsIgnoreOwnerOnPickupFix
rules.description: Fixes Mobs ignoring 'Owner' when picking up loot

rules.name: mobsSpawnOnMovingPistonsFix
rules.description: Fixes mobs being able to spawn on moving pistons

rules.name: mobsTargetDeadEntitiesFix
rules.description: Fixes mobs that fight as a group targeting dead entities, leading to many bugs

rules.name: movableCoralFanFix
rules.description: Fixes coral being movable. Controversial fix - If you don't like it, don't use it xD

rules.name: movingBlocksDestroyPathFix
rules.description: Fixes Moving Blocks from destroying path blocks

rules.name: nbtDataDupeFix
rules.description: Fixes /data duping inventories when modifying entity data

rules.name: noAIStriderGetsColdFix
rules.description: Fixes striders with noAi still getting cold

rules.name: nocomExploitFix
rules.description: Prevents the NoCom Exploit from being able to crash the server
extras: There is a fabric mod that is able to do this in vanilla!

rules.name: nonSolidBlocksBreakCactusIfPushedFix
rules.description: Fixes cactus breaking when moving a non-solid block next to them with a piston

rules.name: noteBlockNotPoweredOnPlaceFix
rules.description: Fixes note blocks not setting there powered state when placed by a player

rules.name: observerUpdateFix
rules.description: Fixes observers not giving block updates when retracted and immediately repowered

rules.name: obsidianPlatformDestroysBlocksFix
rules.description: Fixes the end obsidian platform breaking blocks above the platform every time you travel to the end

rules.name: ocelotsAndCatsTryToFleeInVehicleFix
rules.description: Fixes ocelots and cats trying to flee from the player while being stuck in a vehicle like a boat

rules.name: optimizedBiomeAccess
rules.description: Optimized the getBiome call to be 25% - 75% faster
extras: This is a fully vanilla optimization. This can optimize the client also, go check Blanket-client-tweaks for that

rules.name: optimizedFurnaces
rules.description: Optimized the Furnace code drastically. Improving expensive checks, and expensive recipe lookups
extras: This is a fully vanilla optimization. Improves: Furnace, Blast Furnace, Smoker, & any furnace extension
This is incredibly visible in modded scenarios

rules.name: optimizedHypot
rules.description: Changes MathHelper.hypot to a faster implementation. It gives nearly perfectly accurate results
extras: Currently only effect chunks blending so will likely be unnoticeable. It is ~1.6x faster
recommended that you set this on permanently, and restart the server for best results

rules.name: optimizedPoweredRails
rules.description: Makes rails faster by removing most updates on themselves, duplicate updates, and doing rail search internally
extras: This kind of prevents update suppression using a normal suppressor. It requires an angled suppressor to work!
This probably changes some rail behavior although so far does not seem to do so. Does change amount of block updates tho

rules.name: optimizedRandom
rules.description: Changes many of the main Random() calls to use XoroShiro128++ instead
extras: This will break anything related to random, technically still possible to crack*
recommended that you set this on permanently, and restart the server for best results

rules.name: optimizedRecipeManager
rules.description: Optimized the RecipeManager getFirstMatch call to be up to 3x faster
extras: This is a fully vanilla optimization. Improves: [Blast]Furnace/Campfire/Smoker/Stonecutter/Crafting/Sheep Color Choosing
This was mostly made for the auto crafting table, since the performance boost is much more visible while using that mod

rules.name: optimizedRounding
rules.description: Changes Math.round to a faster implementation. Although it does not give the exact same results
extras: This does not affect many things and will most likely be unnoticeable. It is ~1.28x faster

rules.name: optimizedTicketManager
rules.description: Initial made for Lithium, although was not exactly vanilla behavior. This is a very small optimization!

rules.name: paletteCopyDataCorruptionFix
rules.description: Fixes Palette copy() using the same `listener` which can cause data corruption
extras: Warning! Some mods might actually use this bug as part of there design. Use this to test if your mod is affected!

rules.name: parityMovableLightBlocks
rules.description: Allows pistons to push and pull light blocks

rules.name: parityRandomBlockUpdates
rules.description: Makes block update order random

rules.name: parityTerribleComparators
rules.description: Comparators no longer output level 15 if the full block its reading from is powered if there is a container behind it
extras: Relates to [MC-64394](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-64394) which marked as Works As Intended

rules.name: petsBreakLeadsDuringReloadFix
rules.description: Fixes Leashed pets teleporting to the player when reloaded, breaking there leads

rules.name: pistonDupingFix
rules.description: Fixes TNT & carpet dupers, and part of rail dupers
extras: Attachment block update based dupers will do nothing and redstone component update based dupers can no longer keep their duped block
Implementation by Carpet-TIS-Addition - Dupe bad dig good

rules.name: pistonReloadInconsistencyFix
rules.description: Fixes piston lastProgress not being set correctly

rules.name: pistonUpdateOrderIsLocationalFix
rules.description: Fixes pistons pulling/pushing blocks using a hashmap causing order to be locational

rules.name: pistonsPushEntitiesBehindThemFix
rules.description: Fixes pistons pushing entities behind it, which was the original cause of the item frame dupe
extras: This only fixes modded pistons that use different speeds!

rules.name: pistonsPushTooFarFix
rules.description: Fixes pistons pushing entities too far due to the offset

rules.name: pistonsPushWaterloggedBlocksFix
rules.description: Fixes being able to push waterlogged blocks while retaining the waterlogged state using a short pulse

rules.name: placeBlocksOutsideWorldBorderFix
rules.description: Fixes being able to place blocks outside of the world border

rules.name: playerStepEventFix
rules.description: Fixes players sending the STEP event before the HIT_GROUND event

rules.name: pointedDripstoneWrongCollisionFix
rules.description: Fixes being hurt by pointed dripstone when landing on the block above

rules.name: potionEffectsAffectDeadEntitiesFix
rules.description: Fixes dying entities being affected by splash potion effects and area effect clouds

rules.name: powderSnowOnlySlowIfFeetInBlockFix
rules.description: Fixes powder snow only slowing down players when there feet are in the block

rules.name: powderedSnowOpacityFix
rules.description: Fixes powder snow letting light pass through it

rules.name: projectileGoalTargetsDeadEntitiesFix
rules.description: Fixes the projectileAttackGoal targetting dead entities

rules.name: projectileKeepsVelocityFix
rules.description: Fixes projectiles keeping there velocity

rules.name: projectileMissingOcclusionFix
rules.description: Fixes projectiles sending the PROJECTILE_LAND event when landing on a vibration occluding block

rules.name: projectileNotDetectedOnPlaceFix
rules.description: Fixes placing a button/pressure plate inside of a projectile not activating it

rules.name: railDuplicationFix
rules.description: Fixes rails duplicating

rules.name: railInvalidUpdateOnPushFix
rules.description: Fixes rails updating other rails before checking if they are in a valid location

rules.name: railMissingUpdateAfterPushFix
rules.description: Fixes rails not updating other rails after being moved

rules.name: railMissingUpdateOnPushFix
rules.description: Fixes rails not updating other rails on being moved, allowing for invalid states

rules.name: reIntroduceDonkeyRidingDupe
rules.description: Re-introduces multiplayer donkey/llama dupe bug based on disconnecting while riding donkey/llama
extras: This has not been tested in 1.18 and may not work!

rules.name: reIntroduceFallingBlockEntityPhase
rules.description: Re-introduces falling blocks giving block updates during the entity phase changed in 22w03a

rules.name: reIntroduceFlintAndSteelBehavior
rules.description: Re-introduces 1.12 flint and steel behavior. Flint and steel can be used for updating observers / buds

rules.name: reIntroduceItemShadowing
rules.description: Re-introduces item shadowing!

rules.name: reIntroduceLightningRodPermanentlyPowered
rules.description: Re-introduces lightning rods being permanently powered when moved by pistons

rules.name: reIntroduceOnlyAutoSaveSaving
rules.description: Re-introduces only saving during autosaves instead of any time
extras: Reverts 'saving chunks whenever there is time spare to reduce autosave spikes' from 20w12a
This makes your hard drive work overtime, so people with slow drives might suffer from this. This fixes that!

rules.name: reIntroducePistonTranslocation
rules.description: Re-introduces Piston Translocation from 1.10

rules.name: reIntroducePortalGeneralItemDupe
rules.description: Re-introduces general item dupe using dolphins, and some other dimension change dupes

rules.name: reIntroduceProperGoalTimings
rules.description: Re-introduces or better said, reverts an optimization made in 21w39a that broken many entity goaltimings. The optimization made many tasks slower, and others faster. It was not done correctly!
extras: Technically this was an optimization so enabling this rule will most likely come at a performance cost!

rules.name: reIntroduceTargetBlockPermanentlyPowered
rules.description: Re-introduces target blocks being permanently powered when moved by pistons

rules.name: reIntroduceVeryAggressiveSaving
rules.description: Re-introduces very aggressive saving by removing the chunk save cooldown that was added in 22w05a
extras: For obvious reasons, this does not work when `reIntroduceOnlyAutoSaveSaving` is enabled

rules.name: reIntroduceZeroTickFarms
rules.description: Re-introduces zero tick farms

rules.name: recordWorldEventFix
rules.description: Fixes record world events being sent at the wrong time, causing multiple disks to play at the same time

rules.name: redstoneComponentUpdateOrderOnBreakFix
rules.description: Fixes redstone torch/repeater/comparator update order when being broken, causing incorrect update order

rules.name: redstoneRedirectionMissingUpdateFix
rules.description: Fixes redstone redirection missing updates on redirecting

rules.name: reinforcementsOnlySpawnZombiesFix
rules.description: Fixes reinforcements only spawning zombies

rules.name: reinforcementsSpawnOffCenteredFix
rules.description: Fixes zombie type reinforcements spawning off centered instead of centered on a block

rules.name: reloadUpdateOrderFix
rules.description: Fixes reload update order for tile entities
extras: Fixes instant wires randomly breaking - Effective after chunk reload.

rules.name: repairCostItemNotStackingFix
rules.description: Fixes Named Blocks not stacking due to useless RepairCost tag

rules.name: repeaterPriorityFix
rules.description: Fixes Quick pulses getting lost in repeater setups

rules.name: respawnDragonWithoutAllEndCrystalsFix
rules.description: Fixes being able to respawn the ender dragon using only 2 ender crystals instead of the intended 4

rules.name: saferItemTransfers
rules.description: Changes the code to use less copy calls, and instead pass references when possible

rules.name: sculkSensorBiasFix
rules.description: Fixes the sculk sensor having a directional bias with wool occlusion

rules.name: sculkSensorPrecisionLossFix
rules.description: Fixes signal strength being inaccurate and skipping odd signal strengths due to precision loss with distance

rules.name: selfHarmFix
rules.description: Fixes mobs attacking themselves. Self-Harm should not be taught to kids ;)

rules.name: sheepEatGrassThroughBlocksFix
rules.description: Fixes sheep being able to eat grass through full blocks

rules.name: shipwreckChunkBorderIssuesFix
rules.description: Fixes shipwrecks having different block palettes and heights between chunk borders

rules.name: shulkerBoxMissingUpdateFix
rules.description: Fixes shulker box missing a block update

rules.name: sleepingDelaysFallDamageFix
rules.description: Fixes fall damage being delayed by sleeping, fall damage will be removed instead

rules.name: sleepingResetsThunderFix
rules.description: Fixes the thunder timer being reset whenever players sleep

rules.name: slowedEntityGoalsFix
rules.description: Fixes an optimization in 1.18 changing the behaviour of many goals even though mojang said it would change nothing
extras: This bug results in many goals being slower, or happening less often. It also seems to cause other goals to be faster!

rules.name: snowGolemAttackCreepersFix
rules.description: Fixes snow golem attacking creepers, resulting in there death

rules.name: snowmanCreateSnowWhileFloatingFix
rules.description: Fixes snowman creating snow while not touching the ground

rules.name: soulSpeedIncorrectDamageFix
rules.description: Fixes soul speed enchantment from damaging boots when riding a vehicle

rules.name: spawnChunkEntitiesUnloadingFix
rules.description: Fixes Spawn Chunks not ticking entities and block entities if no player online

rules.name: spawnEggMissingEventFix
rules.description: Fixes Spawning entities using spawn eggs on entities not creating ENTITY_PLACE game event

rules.name: spawnEggMissingOcclusionFix
rules.description: Fixes Spawning entities using spawn eggs on vibration occluding blocks not occluding

rules.name: spawnEggOffsetEventFix
rules.description: Fixes spawn eggs having an offset game event when spawning an entity

rules.name: spawnInsideGatewayFix
rules.description: Fixes the end gateway teleport check using blocks that should be invalid as valid for teleporting

rules.name: spongeUpdateFix
rules.description: Fixes sponges not giving block updates when absorbing water

rules.name: statusUpdateDelay
rules.description: Allows you to change how long the server player list wait before updating
extras: delay is in nanoseconds. Default is 5 seconds (5000000000) [1m,10s,5s,1s]

rules.name: stepAndDestroyBlockGoalUsesOriginFix
rules.description: Fixes the stepAndDestroyBlockGoal using the origin without first checking if its valid

rules.name: stringDupeFix
rules.description: Fixes a string dupe using water & tripwire hooks

rules.name: stringTagExploitFix
rules.description: Fixes StringTag Exploits due to StringTag writeUTF() not respecting readUTF() Limits causing crashes internally
extras: This was the cause of ChunkRegen, and the book dupe. Both patched, although StringTag is still broken

rules.name: structureManagerCantLoadSnbtFix
rules.description: Fixes the structure manager not being able to load snbt versions of nbt files
extras: This makes it possible for structure blocks to load snbt files also.
Should not be used in survival or for datapacks, since its slower than nbt

rules.name: sweepingIgnoresFireAspectFix
rules.description: Fixes sweeping edge not applying fire aspect

rules.name: tagKeyMemoryLeakFix
rules.description: Fixes a memory leak within the new TagKey system

rules.name: tallGrassWaterWontSpreadFix
rules.description: Fixes tall grass not spreading water

rules.name: targetBlockUpdateFix
rules.description: Fixes target blocks not giving shape updates when retracted and immediately repowered

rules.name: teleportPastWorldBorderFix
rules.description: Fixes enderman, chorus fruit, and some other teleports from teleporting past the world border

rules.name: tileDropsAffectedByFloatingPointFix
rules.description: Fixes tile drops at the world border spawning at the wrong location

rules.name: tntCantUseNetherPortalsFix
rules.description: Fixes TNT Entity not being able to go through nether portals

rules.name: tntExtendedHitboxClipFix
rules.description: Fixes tnt being created in extended hitboxes causing tnt to clip through them

rules.name: tntMinecartExplodesTwiceFix
rules.description: Fixes Tnt Minecarts being able to explode twice, killing their own drops

rules.name: tntMinecartTerribleCollisionFix
rules.description: Fixes tnt minecarts blowing up when basically turning any rail while next to a block

rules.name: toggleEnforceWhitelist
rules.description: Allows you to toggle enforcing the whitelist without needing to restart the server

rules.name: toggleFlightEnabled
rules.description: Allows you to toggle flightEnabled without needing to restart the server

rules.name: toggleOnlineMode
rules.description: Allows you to toggle onlineMode without needing to restart the server

rules.name: togglePreventProxyConnections
rules.description: Allows you to toggle preventing proxy connections without needing to restart the server

rules.name: togglePvpEnabled
rules.description: Allows you to toggle pvpEnabled without needing to restart the server

rules.name: tradeDemandDecreasesIndefinitelyFix
rules.description: Fixes villager trade demand decreases indefinitely

rules.name: transparentBlocksNegateEnchantingFix
rules.description: Fixes Transparent blocks placed between bookshelves and enchanting tables negating bonuses received

rules.name: trapdoorMissingUpdateFix
rules.description: Fixes some blocks not popping off when a trapdoor opens

rules.name: treeTrunkLogicFix
rules.description: Fixes trees considering the bottom block as a trunk and modifying leaves because of it

rules.name: tridentFallingDamageFix
rules.description: Fixes tridents not dealing damage after having been in a block

rules.name: tripwireHookDupeFix
rules.description: Fixes a tripwire hook dupe using doors & trapdoors

rules.name: tripwireNotDisarmingFix
rules.description: Fixes tripwires not being disarmed correctly

rules.name: turtleEggWrongCollisionCheckFix
rules.description: Fixes being able to step on turtle eggs without colliding with the collision shape

rules.name: unableToModifyPlayerDataFix
rules.description: Fixes not being able to use /data on players

rules.name: updateSuppressionFix
rules.description: Prevents update suppression from working. When the stack is reached, the following updates are moved to the next tick
extras: This does not prevent stack overflow exploits, it simple makes sure to update block after

rules.name: uselessDetectorRailUpdateFix
rules.description: Fixes the detector rail giving useless comparator updates on entity collision

rules.name: uselessSelfBlockUpdateFix
rules.description: Fixes blocks using updateNeighbors() on blocks next to them, making itself get a block update even though it does not accept block updates
extras: Some blocks do accept block updates, although we make sure to update them correctly

rules.name: velocitySeparateAxisCancellingFix
rules.description: Fixes player velocity on X and Z axis being cancelled separately at low values

rules.name: viewerCountNegativesFix
rules.description: Fixes the viewer count for some inventories (chest, ender chest, barrel) being able to go into the negatives

rules.name: villagerDiscountIgnoresOfflinePlayersFix
rules.description: Fixes villagers not giving a discount if you log out while they are being cured

rules.name: villagerToWitchBedOccupiedFix
rules.description: Fixes villagers converting to witches while sleeping, not changing the bed occupancy

rules.name: voidKillsLoyaltyTridentsFix
rules.description: Fixes the void killing loyalty tridents, even though they should come back to the player

rules.name: voidTradingFix
rules.description: Fixes void trading
extras: The ability to trade with a villager in unloaded chunks allowing for infinite trading

rules.name: witchAndCatSpawnMergedFix
rules.description: Fixes witches & cats spawning inside of each other, by shifting the cat over by another block

rules.name: witchHutsSpawnIncorrectCatFix
rules.description: Fixes incorrect cat types spawning inside swamp huts

rules.name: witherGolemSpawningFix
rules.description: Fixes Withers and Golems not spawning due to replaceable blocks being in the way

rules.name: worldBorderCollisionRoundingFix
rules.description: Fixes world border collision rounding to blocks for entity collisions

rules.name: wrongPressurePlateHitboxFix
rules.description: Fixes the pressure plate hitbox not matching the model

rules.name: xpOrbCollisionFix
rules.description: Fixes experience orbs treating flowing lava as a full block

rules.name: zeroDamageHurtsWolvesFix
rules.description: Fixes wolves getting hurt from damage that should not hurt, such as snowballs
